features: Two adorably cute huggable baby dolls with the sweetest little eyes (blue & brown) and facial expressions you’ve ever seen.
13” soft body and life-like vinyl head, hands, and feet that make pretend playtime fun and realistic for children 2 and older. Safety Tested and Approved.
Easy to clean - just spot wash the body with warm water and light soap after removing the machine-washable owl-themed outfits with matching hats
Soft & cuddly body encourages non-stop hugging, holding, and special care which in turn develops self-soothing techniques
Made by JC Toys - the only baby doll manufacturer with over 30 years’ experience. Proud to be Designed by Berenguer
body.description: Double the Fun! These cute and cuddly twins are the perfect dolls for EXTRA hugging. With such adorable expressions and soft cuddly bodies how can you resist just one more HUG! They come dressed in matching owl themed outfits that are super soft and machine washable. Because these cuties never get tired of hugs, all your child needs is a loving heart and wide-open arms. Vinyl can be spot washed with a mild soap and water. From newborn boy baby dolls to toddler girl dolls, you're sure to find the perfect doll from JC Toys. This doll is perfect for everyone 2+. JC Toys meets and exceeds all Toy Safety Requirements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super fast delivery! Lovely item as promised!
reviews.reviewText: This was for a gift and the child was delighted. Beautiful quality and terrific value for the money! Looked to be well made. Very fast shipping. I'm a very happy consumer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and not too big in size!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Great quality in perfect size for what I needed them for. Used them for a blindfolded diaper changing contest at a baby shower and they were a hit!! The diapers were definitely a bit big on the baby dolls but not too big that it still worked perfectly. So much fun and the dolls were adorable for the mom to be to keep for later!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These little twin dolls are adorable. They are very well made, comes with bottles and a toy. Very good price. The faces are so cute, each with a different expression.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price!
reviews.reviewText: Needed something last minute for a baby shower. Got delivered the next day. The dolls are adorable and worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The baby dolls are so adorable! They have such cute faces!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars At first I found that this dolls are quite scary
reviews.reviewText: At first I found that these dolls are quite scary and much more for being with their mouths open with a smile. I kept them hidden saying if I should give them to my 2-year-old daughter or I should take them to the trash, in this way I would lose my money, but I would protect my daughter from possible trauma, and then I decided to take a chance, because I taught them to my daughter and It was love at first sight I was totally in love with her baby dolls and I hug them with a lot of love, seeing their happiness made buying these dolls worth every dollar. When I received them, they had exactly the same outfits as those illustrated (pink and blue stripes with owls) They may be a little smaller than illustrated, but they are the perfect size for a child 3 years old and up. Playability The open mouth baby is perfect for feeding and its bottles and pacifiers perfectly in its mouth. materials The plastic is soft, smooth to the touch and the body is soft. I put them directly in my washing machine (I washed the outfit separately) and they came out perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These baby dolls are adorable. Faces so cute. Perfect size for toddlers. Very huggable and soft bodies. I bought these for OCC shoebox gifts. Will fit into shoebox with no problem. Good quality dolls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Twin baby dolls
reviews.reviewText: My grand daughter loved these cute little babies.

Loved this product. It came with 2 babies both with smothers and a bottle.My daughter loves them and I live the great quality as many baby dolls are not the best quality these days.Would definitely recommend this product and for the quality it is a reasonable price point.
Son bonitos pero un poco pequeños
belle qualité, jolies bouilles, taille idéale 3 et 4 ans, corps mous pour de gros câlins, tétines et biberons très appréciés

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 15, 2021
reviews.reviewText: These dolls are so cute, they have different expressions. They were bought for 2yr old Granddaughter she loves them. Her “Babies are called Thomas and Rosy” The size of the dolls is just right they are lightweight and easy for her to carry around. Would definitely recommend.
